name: Respawn Attack
description:
Destroy helicopters by shooting them or with your special "respawn attack".

As a blatant clone for Heli Attack this game incorporates a lot of juice, like particle effects, screenshakes and a quite nice 10 color Palette and fast-paced military soundtrack.

Thanks to @Thunraz for creating some awesome sprites.

This Game was also used for a presentation on Indie Outpost (please see this link). There is a Timelapse Video of the creation process on youtube.

Respawn Attack is written using C# and SFML.NET 2.1 as well as Cubase for sound and sfxr for sound effects.
